Package settings

Class ControlData

java.lang.Object
settings.ControlData
public class ControlData extends Object
The ControlData class is responsible for managing the data of the application. It provides methods to get and set the data, and to read and write the data from and to different sources.

    • getInfoFromAPI

      public static void getInfoFromAPI() throws MalformedURLException, ConvertFromJSONException
      Retrieve data from API endpoints and write to data arrays.
      Throws:
      MalformedURLException - If the URL of an API endpoint is invalid.
      ConvertFromJSONException - If there is an error converting JSON data to Java objects.

    • writeData

      public static void writeData(org.json.JSONArray productsJSON, org.json.JSONArray cartsJSON, org.json.JSONArray usersJSON) throws ConvertFromJSONException
      Write data to data arrays.
      Parameters:
      productsJSON - The JSON array containing products data.
      cartsJSON - The JSON array containing carts data.
      usersJSON - The JSON array containing users data.
      Throws:
      ConvertFromJSONException - If there is an error converting JSON data to Java objects.
